thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au | 4 of 693
thread.title: Nick
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by Nick

author: Nick
title: Nick
text:
Only minor issue was the small amount of damage not noted on the damage report form. Had to photograph and return to the desk to report and add to the form.
The rental agent was very helpful and added without hesitation.
Always check your car before leaving the depot. Once you drive away any damage is then your responsibility.
